title: Konkrete Block & Strategycide - Two New Faces
content:
New from the dementia of Mike Adkins and the Fontry....

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131020200450im_/http:/typophile.com/files/KonkreteBlock2512_5546.jpg)

[available at MyFonts](http://web.archive.org/web/20131020200450/http:/new.myfonts.com/fonts/fontry/fty-konkrete/)

and...

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131020200450im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Strategycide512_4236.jpg)

author: phrostbyte64
